articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Drone Attack, Self-Propelled Flak Rocket Drills
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Drone Attack, Self-Propelled Flak Rocket Drills
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, on Wednesday guided a drill of super precision drone planes assaulting targets and a firing drill of self-propelled flak rocket destroying "enemy" cruise missile coming in attack in low altitude.
					 He was greeted on the spot by commanding officers of the air and anti-air force and artillery units of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un ordered the drills to be started after receiving a report on the exercise plan at the observation post.
					
					 Super precision drone planes lifted off to the sky.
					
					 After making long-range flight as planned, the planes headed toward "enemy positions" and stormed the targets, destroying them with accuracy.
					
					 After closely watching the planes assaulting targets with a pair of binoculars, Kim Jong Un said that the planes are very fast and have high target discerning ability.
					
					 The planes were assigned the flight route and time with the targets in south Korea in mind, Kim Jong Un said, adding with great satisfaction that they were was proved to be able to mount super precision attack on any enemy targets.
					
					 It was followed by the drill of a self-propelled flak rocket firing at an "enemy" cruise missile that comes in attack in low altitude.
					
					 A target disguised as Tomahawk cruise missile of the enemy appeared in the sky above the drilling ground.
					
					 An outburst of fire with roaring blast flew toward the missile, destroying it at a single shot.
					
					 Kim Jong Un highly estimated the performance of the self-propelled flak rocket.
					
					 He called for further raising the performance of drone and rocket which demonstrated their might in the drills and urged the soldiers to get fully ready to mount super precision strike at any target any time.
					
					 When the drills turn into a battle, the enemies will be made to drink a bitter cup, unable to raise their heads, in the face of retaliatory blows of the strong revolutionary Paektusan army, he said.
					
					 He said that if the enemies, oblivious of the tremendous might of the KPA, make even the slightest movement, he will give an order to destroy not only the military installments and puppet reactionary ruling institutions in the operational theater in south Korea but the relevant facilities of countries following the U.S. war moves for invading the DPRK, and the military bases of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in the operational theatre of the Pacific.
					
					 He continued that time has gone when only words were made, stressing the need to destroy the enemies without mercy so that not a single man can survive to sign a document of surrender when a battle starts.
					
					 He stressed the need to have at command the coordinates of every enemy target in the operational theater of south Korea and input them in precision drone attack means of the Korean style so that they should make point attack on any target any moment. He also set forth important tasks in making full combat preparations of the KPA as required by the prevailing situation.
					
					 He once again called on all the service personnel of the KPA to maintain high alert posture and wait for his order for the grand advance for national reunification. He had a photo session with the soldiers.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Pyong Chol, Pak Jong Chon and Son Chong Nam.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Strategic Bomber's Sortie to Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Letting Strategic Bomber Make Sortie to Korean Peninsula 
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Wednesday as regards the action taken by the U.S. aggressor forces to let B-52 make sortie to the Korean Peninsula:  
					 The U.S. is reportedly letting its  B-52  deployed on Guam make sortie to the Korean Peninsula on Mar. 19 in the wake of its sortie made on Mar. 8.
					
					 U.S. Deputy Secretary of Defence Carter made a junket to south Korea on March 18, where he was closeted with south Korean puppet Minister of Defence Kim Kwan Jin over "south Korea-U.S. joint reaction" to the DPRK's threat. There Carter blustered that B-52 would be involved in the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills on Mar. 19 to demonstrate the U.S. will to defend south Korea and such sorties would continue in the future, too.
					
					 It is an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK to sound out its strongest will that the U.S. is introducing a strategic nuclear strike means to the Korean Peninsula at a time when its situation is inching close to the brink of war.
					
					 The DPRK is now closely watching the move of B-52 and the hostile forces will never escape its strong military counteraction, should the strategic bomber make such sortie to the peninsula again.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Namibia
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Namibia
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Hifikepunye Pohamba, president of the Republic of Namibia, on its 23rd independence day.
					 Kim wished the president and people of Namibia greater success in their work to promote the national unity and achieve socio-economic development of the country, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Namibia would grow stronger.

articles.title: Greetings to Tunisian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian President
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on March 20 sent a message of greeting to Al Moncef Al Marzouki, president of Tunisia, on its national day.
					 In the message Kim expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and sincerely wished the friendly Tunisian people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: UN Security Council, Imperialists' Tool for High-handed, Arbitrary Practices (2): News Analyst
articles.content:
UN Security Council, Imperialists' Tool for High-handed, Arbitrary Practices (2): News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The Afghan war that broke out in the first year of the 21st century was an unprecedented state-sponsored terrorism. The U.S. abused its hand-raising machine UN Security Council to openly invade the country, defying the world.
					 Right after the September 11, 2001 incident, the U.S. stirred up "terror-phobia" in the world and braced up for a worldwide war called a "war on terrorism".
					
					 It, at the same time, manipulated the passage of anti-terrorism resolution at the UNSC by employing a gamut of appeasement and deceptive tricks in a bid to elicit international support.
					
					 U.S. President Bush at a conference of the UN General Assembly spoke loudly of the duty of all the countries to wage an "anti-terror war" to implement the UNSC resolution. He threatened to call to account those countries providing assistance or havens to the terrorists.
					
					 It was a declaration of a war to attack any country of its choosing. 
					
					 Afghanistan was the first to fall victim to the "war on terrorism".
					
					 The madcap "anti-terror war" waged by the Bush Administration was aimed at aggression and conquest of the world, pursuant to the neo-conservatives' design of establishing a "uni-polar world" dominated by the U.S. This gravely jeopardized the world peace and security. This is everyone's knowledge.
					
					 Tragic is that the UNSC professing assuming responsibility for world peace and security moved at the beck and call of the U.S. imperialists, entailing the serious consequences.
					
					 The same was the case with Iraq.
					
					 The U.S. and the West have been engaged in a smear campaign to topple the government in Iraq after the Gulf War. They set Iraq as the target of attack next to Afghanistan and inveigled the UNSC into the campaign against the country while peddling the story of "threat by weapons of mass destruction."
					
					 As a result of pressure by the U.S. and the West and a political bargaining among big powers, UNSC's Resolution 1441 on the inspection of weapons of mass destruction in Iraq was adopted in November 2002.
					
					 The resolution said that it gives Iraq the last chance to fulfill its duty to disarm in line with the UNSC's relevant resolution and threatened that the country will face a serious end in case it again fails to comply with the duty.
					
					 This, as commented by the world public, was a "pass to a war" that gave the U.S. the green light to disarm Iraq.
					
					 On the strength of this ultimatum, the U.S. forced Iraq to completely disarm itself and confirmed that it does not have any weapons capable of mounting fatal attack on the U.S. At a UNSC session in February 2003, the U.S. presented false data on Iraq's possession of weapons of mass destruction and the relations between the then Iraqi government and terrorist organizations, securing the pretext for invading Iraq.
					
					 At last in March the same year, the U.S. launched military invasion of the country.
					
					 The world was shocked at the U.S. gangster-like act which invaded a sovereign state with impunity by abusing the UNSC. The world complained that "UNSC was dead".
					
					 The then Nepalese newspaper Katmandu Post said but for the UN, the previous Gulf War and the present Gulf War would not have broken out.

articles.title: Preparations for New School Year Close to Completion in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for New School Year Close to Completion in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The preparations for new school year are making progress at a final stage in the DPRK.
					 Brisk is the work to equip schools with better educational conditions and environment amid state and social concern.
					
					 Educational institutions are reinforcing teaching staff in touch with relevant units while helping teachers improve their qualifications through teaching course, lecture, etc.
					
					 Teachers of primary and secondary schools and colleges are busy making preparations for teaching.
					
					 North and South Phyongan and other provinces chose model units and are encouraging other units to spruce up them like Kyongsang Kindergarten and generalize their achievements.
					
					 Teacher-training universities including Kim Hyong Jik University of Education are steadily improving educational programs and methods in order to train more able reserve teachers.
					
					 Production is kept  going at a high rate at the Pyongyang Higher Educational Book Printing House, Pyongyang Disabled Soldiers' Educational Book Printing House and the Wonsan Higher Educational Book Printing House. 
					
					 Signal successes are reported from the Pyongyang Experimental Apparatus Factory, Pyongyang Scientific Experimental Apparatus Factory, Phyongchon Educational Equipment Factory, Hamhung Musical Instrument Factory, Kaesong Bio-specimen Factory and Pyongyang School Things Factory.
					
					 Meanwhile, the preparations for enforcing the universal 12 year compulsory education are also making progress.
					
					 Officials of the Education Commission, with the help of scientists and teachers, completed in a short span of time an educational programme defining the general goal of pre-school education and secondary general education, the goal of schools and the scope and level of education contents.

articles.title: Exhibition Encourages Consumer Goods Production
articles.content:
Exhibition Encourages Consumer Goods Production
						
 Pyongyang March 20 (KCNA) -- A national consumer goods exhibition, which is now going on at the Three-Revolution Exhibition here, has called forth an active response from among light industrial officials and workers and other people in the country.
					 According to Kim Pyong O, department director of the Ministry of Light Industry, the exhibition is of weighty significance in popularizing the success and experience of units which have taken the lead in the production of consumer goods.
					
					 Drawing the attention of visitors are bread, cookies and processed meat presented by Sonhung and Kumsong foodstuff factories.
					
					 The exhibits include well-designed spikes, sneakers, table tennis shoes and other footwear produced at the Ryuwon Shoes Factory, which are very popular among sportspersons.
					
					 Also there are functional cosmetics and high-quality perfumes and baby carriage and bicycles of various purposes made by the Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory, Pyongyang Perfume Factory and the Phyongjin Bicycle Joint Venture Company.

articles.title: Cancel of Korean Armistice Agreement Is Natural
articles.content:
Cancel of Korean Armistice Agreement Is Natural
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Over the recent statement of a spokesman of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, which declared invalid the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA), the United States and its allies have asserted that AA was adopted by mutual agreement and it can not be made void one-sidedly.
					 As clarified in the March 14 statement of a DPRK Foreign Ministry spokesman, AA is not one that requires bilateral agreement to be rendered invalid from its peculiar nature and it will be naturally nullified if one side does not abide by it.
					
					 Signed on July 27, 1953, it was a transitional measure suggesting that all foreign forces be withdrawn from the Korean Peninsula in an aim to ensure lasting peace there.
					
					 It is an international practice to withdraw, after the end of a war, troops from a foreign country in order to thaw the hostile relations between the belligerent parties and put the bilateral relations on a normal track. 
					
					 However, the U.S. concluded the "Mutual Defense Treaty" with south Korea, which stipulates permanent presence of its troops in south Korea, and has persistently committed actions going against AA over the past 60 years, keeping its military presence in south Korea.
					
					 In November 1953, it defined as its ultimate goal to prevent the spread of communism into south Korea by turning it into a military ally while maintaining the armistice regime until "pro-American unification" is achieved on the peninsula.
					
					 Accordingly, the U.S. deliberately ruptured the Geneva conference for a peaceful solution to the Korean issue in June 1954. It also turned down all proposals made by the DPRK government, including a proposal for conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. and a proposal for convening four-party talks aimed to replace the armistice agreement with a peace accord.
					
					 The U.S. turned south Korea into its biggest military base and nuclear arsenal in the Far East, intensifying DPRK-targeted war rehearsals year by year.
					
					 Since the U.S. war maneuverings against the DPRK, a belligerent party, have reached an extreme pitch, interwoven with persistent economic blockade, nobody can predict what and when would break out on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Now that it became clear that AA can not avert the outbreak of war on the peninsula, DPRK's decision that it will be no longer committed to AA is a self-defensive measure taken to cope with the possible war by the hostile forces.
					
					 Therefore, the U.S. assertion is little different from a thief crying for a thief.
					
					 The DPRK army and people will mete out stern punishment to the war maniacs who finally made AA ineffective.

articles.title: "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order", Song Vibrant with Fighting Spirit
articles.content:
"Leader, Just Give Us Your Order", Song Vibrant with Fighting Spirit
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Song "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" is now heard everywhere in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Created in Juche 56 (1967), the song reflects the steadfast will of the DPRK servicepersons and civilians to wipe out the U.S. imperialists at a stroke, once an order of action is given by the supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Whenever a grave situation prevailed on the Korean Peninsula due to the the U.S. and its followers' moves to stifle socialist Korea, its people would smash the provocative moves, singing this song.
					
					 The DPRK government has made painstaking efforts to achieve the national reunification in a peaceful way.
					
					 However, the U.S. and the south Korean regime turned their faces away from the aboveboard reunification proposals made by the DPRK, persisting in the hostile policy toward it.
					
					 Recently the U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK over its peaceful satellite launch and nuclear test for self-defence.
					
					 It is now staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK, with involvement of its huge armed forces and nuclear attack means, leading the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 Peace is precious for the DPRK army and people but the nation's dignity and sovereignty are more precious.
					
					 Han Song Chol, a 44-year-old man living in Yomju County, North Phyongan Province, told KCNA:
					
					 "The appealing song mirrors the strong will of the DPRK people to wipe out the U.S. imperialists and their followers from the earth by dint of arms of justice.
					
					 It encourages me to turn out in an all-out action for national reunification." 
					
					 As the song says, the DPRK people are now willing to turn the strongholds of the provokers into a sea of flames and attain the national reunification, once an order is given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK Army and People Ready for All-out Action
articles.content:
DPRK Army and People Ready for All-out Action
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have been put on a high alert for all-out action, only awaiting an order from Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Written on their military hardware is a slogan "Annihilate the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemy of the Korean people!"
					
					 The slogan represents the DPRK army's steadfast will to exterminate the U.S. imperialists, who have inflicted untold miseries and sufferings upon the Korean nation since the intrusion of their aggression ship "General Sherman" into the Taedong River in 1866.
					
					 In the period of the last Korean War (1950-1953), the U.S. imperialists slaughtered many Koreans in a most brutal way. They killed more than 35 000 inhabitants in Sinchon County alone by way of skinning off and dismembering.
					
					 Although it has been 60 years after the ceasefire, the DPRK people's resentment against the U.S. imperialists is running higher as the days go by. Now is the time for them to finally settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Should the U.S. imperialists intrude into the territorial waters, air and land of DPRK even 0.001mm, its armed forces and people will annihilate the aggressors with strong retaliatory strikes and achieve the final victory in the long-standing showdown with the U.S.

articles.title: 15th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
15th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The 15th Kimilsungia Festival is to open in Pyongyang with splendor on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The festival will be held at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition from mid-April, 2013. 
					
					 Armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, servicepersons, people, officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other overseas Koreans and foreign friends are to take part in the festival.
					
					 There will be immortal flower exhibitions in local areas and Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses are to be visited by local people.

articles.title: U.S. Sanctions against DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Sanctions against DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its allies are sadly mistaken if they think they can shake the revolutionary faith and will of the Korean people and break the single-minded unity of the DPRK through their base sanctions campaign.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 Accusing the U.S. of having worked hard to impair the high international authority and position of the DPRK, obstruct its peaceful economic construction and undermine its socialism, the article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies' sanctions against the DPRK are unprecedented in history for their harsh, base, persistent and protracted nature.
					
					 Since November 1949 when it knocked into shape the Coordination Committee for Export to Communist Area, the U.S. has escalated sanctions against the DPRK by running the whole gamut of laws such as the "Act on Export Control" and the "Act on Foreign Aid."
					
					 The U.S. and its allies prodded the UN Security Council into cooking up the "resolution on sanctions" 2087 on January 22, in particular, wantonly encroaching upon the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 They again fabricated the "resolution on sanctions" 2094 against the DPRK on March 7.
					
					 They restricted and banned the dealings in almost fields of the DPRK under the pretext of dual use ranging from goods for people's living to equipment of major factories and ultra-modern technology, to say nothing of defence field. 
					
					 A typical example of their actions was that the U.S. unreasonably linked the Banco Delta Asia in Macao, China with the DPRK in 2005 and prevented U.S. businesses and banks as well as financial organs in the world from dealing with the Macao bank.
					
					 There are hundreds of sanction-related acts and measures being applied by the U.S. against the DPRK.
					
					 With nothing can the U.S. block the DPRK from invariably advancing along the road of Songun, the article says, urging the U.S. to stop at once its new sanctions racket and adventurous joint military exercises against the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Sophism of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Sophism of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers   
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are busy describing the all-out action of the army and people of the DPRK as "psychological warfare" and a campaign for "rallying forces". The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are claiming that the action taken by the DPRK to nullify the Armistice Agreement (AA) and non-aggression agreements is a "violation" in a desperate bid to mislead the public opinion. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 These outcries are no more than a base ploy to cover up their heinous nature and pass the buck for the present tense situation to the DPRK.
					
					 It is the steadfast determination of the DPRK to drop the curtain on the U.S. imperialists and their stooges' aggressive moves against it while regarding their frantic provocation as a golden chance to retaliate against them. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should stop such ridiculous action to tarnish the DPRK's will and spirit of annihilating the enemy with the above-said rhetoric.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces have desperately escalated the rackets for a war against the DPRK in wanton violation of the AA and nonaggression agreements. They have thus unhesitatingly gone beyond the dangerous line. These moves made the nullification of the AA and nonaggression agreements irreversible.
					
					 They should look back upon the crimes they have committed by reducing the AA into a dead paper and throwing away nonaggression agreements like a pair of old shoes before blaming the DPRK.
					
					 They had better stop letting loose a spate of sheer sophism intended to mislead public opinion and get ready to meet their final end.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Charade Orchestrated by S. Korea as Regards Cyber Attacks on DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Charade Orchestrated by S. Korea as Regards Cyber Attacks on DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, leading internet websites of the DPRK were hit hard by virus attacks. The south Korean puppet regime is letting its paid experts spread the rumor that "it is likely to be a charade orchestrated by the north". The ultra-right conservative media are hyping this rumor by echoing their assertion. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff who mounted the cyber attacks as it was timed to coincide with the nuclear war exercises staged by the U.S. and south Korean warmongers against the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean regime is spreading the rumor because of its guilty conscience. 
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that it is letting loose even sophism that a vicious code with function of Ddos attack which they suspect it is "made  by  the north" is detected without let-up, "the north is going to attack main facilities with cyber terror" and that "the north may make a retaliatory provocation". On Mar. 15, it "served such warning that the north may cause a Ddos attack in the light of the fact that it targets mainly websites of military generals different from the attack made to gather financial information, etc." This propaganda is aimed at implanting anti-DPRK hostility into the minds of south Koreans and justifying the policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen and war. This goes to prove that the cyber attacks on the DPRK were perpetrated according to the carefully worked out scenario in advance. 
					
					 The rumor floated by the south Korean regime about cyber attacks on the DPRK is little short of another anti-DPRK farce orchestrated by it with the backing of the U.S. to secure a pretext for igniting a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The ceaseless ridiculous plots hatched by the puppet forces for a war of aggression against the DPRK would only bring into bolder relief their true colors and precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: Traitors Will Meet Miserable End: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Traitors Will Meet Miserable End: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Nationwide campaign has started to punish traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 The prosecution of south Korea started investigating graft and corruption cases including the case of purchasing housing lot in Naegok-dong and illegal surveillance of civilians in which the traitor had been involved after broad segments of south Koreans referred those cases to the prosecutor's office.
					
					 With this as a starting point, a nationwide campaign is flaring up across south Korea calling for punishing Lee as a top-class traitor, not just subjecting him to legal procedures like taking legal actions and bringing him to justice.
					
					 No sooner had he stepped down than the south Koreans, as if they had waited for it, turned out in a campaign for punishing him, an eruption of their pent-up grudge and a just action for realizing social justice.
					
					 Not only Koreans but the international community admit that he is human scum who should be brought to justice and eliminated from the political arena.
					
					 Corruption and swindling in which Lee and his family and relatives and close confidants have been involved are unprecedented ones in the nation's history.
					
					 Those crimes shocked the people, and south Korean society has been reduced to a corrupt society and a living hell on earth.
					
					 During his office, Lee has more loudly called for "human rights" than any others. But the harsh violence of people who demanded their vital rights, including the killing of evacuees of Ryongsan and the suppression of workers of Ssangyong Motors, put into the shade the successive military dictators.
					
					 So innumerable are crimes he committed against the nation by escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and war moves.
					
					 The north-south ties plunged to a complete deadlock and a serious stumbling block was created in the way of peace and reunification due to the acts of treachery of Lee who escalated confrontation with fellow countrymen after selling off the interests of the nation to his American and Japanese patrons. 
					
					 Never to be pardoned is the traitor's act of harming the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and unhesitatingly attempting at the hideous state-sponsored terrorism.
					
					 The traitor committed so huge crimes during his five years in office that he would not be able to redress them after the lapse of 500 or 5 000 years.
					
					 It is quite natural that the south Koreans are turning out to force the traitor to pay for his crimes after branding him as a matchless traitor and human scum who put the "five traitors of 1905" into the shade.
					
					 Lee is gravely mistaken if he thinks he can go scot-free after serving a prison term like the preceding military murderers though he had been engrossed in evil acts against the people, reunification and humanity.
					
					 Traitors will be made to experience the final treatment to be meted out to them by the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Forces Busy with Drills for Preemptive Nuclear Strike at DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Forces Busy with Drills for Preemptive Nuclear Strike at DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers are busy with drills for a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK as part of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					 B-52 took off from the air force base on Guam on March 19 and was busy flying in the air over the firing range in Nyongwol, south Korean Kangwon Province for hours as part of the drill for making a nuclear strike at areas of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is set to keep introducing B-52 into south Korea even after Key Resolve in an effort to examine its capability for nuclear strike, etc. 
					
					 The U.S. Aegis equipped with the missile defence system entered the East Sea of Korea, timed to coincide with the appearance of B-52 in the air over south Korea.
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. is mulling the participation of nuclear-powered submarine armed with nuclear missiles in the Foal Eagle drill.
					
					 In this regard south Korean media held that the U.S. opening to public as an exception of the military drills involving strategic bomber and nuclear submarine which it has regarded as secret till now is aimed at confirming its provision of a nuclear umbrella to south Korea and serving a warning to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is claiming that ballistic missile, nuclear submarine and B-52 serve as the three nuclear strike means to be provided by it to its allies.
					
					 The prevailing grave situation where the U.S. has become evermore undisguised in its moves to make a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK goes to clearly show who is the arch criminal threatening peace on this land.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists had better stop acting rashly, properly understanding the will of the army and people that have turned out as one in an all-out action for a final victory.

articles.title: S. Korea Mulls Staging Drill in Forefront Area
articles.content:
S. Korea Mulls Staging Drill in Forefront Area 
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The 1st Corps of the south Korean puppet army mulls staging a combined drill in the forefront area in the northern part of Kyonggi Province including Koyang and Phaju from Mar. 25 to 29, according to the south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 The south Korean warmongers are going to mobilize troops and mobile means of the corps for the military drill to be staged under the simulated conditions of infiltration and terror by someone. 
					
					 The danger of war is mounting on the Korean Peninsula due to the war-drumbeats of the south Korean warmongers timed to coincide with the on-going Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, pursuant to the scenario for invading the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage War Drills on Islands in West Sea
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage War Drills on Islands in West Sea
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- South Korean warmongers staged madcap war drills on Yonphyong and Paekryong islands in the West Sea of Korea on Tuesday, according to the south Korean KBS. 
					 The marine corps on Yonphyong Island staged live shell firing drills of tanks, artillery pieces and other offensive weapons for several hours, kicking up war hysteria. 
					
					 Civilians, administrative officials and police on the island were hurled into the drills. 
					
					 A similar war drill was staged on Paekryong Island under the name of combined drill. 
					
					 Such saber-rattling was staged on those islands, the most dangerous hotspots, to ignite a war at any cost.

articles.title: Reparation to Victims of False Case Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Reparation to Victims of False Case Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The Seoul High Court of south Korea recently held that the "government" authorities should pay a reparation to those related to the case of the National Democratic Youths and Students League.
					 In the 1970s youth and students of south Korea organized the National Democratic Youths and Students League with democratic students organizations of 24 universities in six cities and high schools in different parts of south Korea.
					
					 From late in 1973 the organization spearheaded its actions against dictatorship and outside forces, holding slogans calling for the abolition of the "yusin" dictatorship, freedom of media, press, assembly and demonstration, dissolution of the Central Intelligence Agency, opposition to the talks with Japan and release of prisoners of conscience.
					
					 Regarding these actions as a thorn in their flesh, the "yusin" dictatorial forces fabricated again the case of the Committee for Rebuilding the People's Revolutionary Party in April 1974. They arrested more than 4 000 persons, labeling the National Democratic Youths and Students League as "a seditious anti-government organization" manipulated by the committee, and sentenced to death and heavy penalties hardcore elements by invoking fascist laws.
					
					 In December 2005 the south Korean authorities admitted that "the case of the National Democratic Youths and Students League was the one which was suppressed by distorting anti-government demonstrations of students" and afterwards made a decision of declaring those related to the case not guilty.
					
					 In this connection victims and their families have staged actions to have the crimes committed by the past "yusin" dictatorship settled, demanding the authorities pay a reparation to them.

articles.title: Koreans in China Call for Foiling War Moves
articles.content:
Koreans in China Call for Foiling War Moves
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China Monday made public a statement "Let the 70 million Koreans turn out to resolutely foil the moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean bellicose forces to ignite a new war."
					 The statement said that the officials of the association and Koreans in China fully support the "Appeal to entire Korean nation" issued by the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea.
					
					 It accused the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers of staging the madcap north-targeted Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war exercises with the latest nuclear war means involved in the sky and on the land and seas of south Korea against the backdrop of the fierce racket of the U.S. and other hostile forces for "sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 They are taking issue with the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, happiness and pride of Koreans, it said, adding: This amounts to an unpardonable insult to the dignity and sovereignty and a blatant challenge to the Korean nation.
					
					 It is high time that all Koreans turned out as one in the nationwide sacred struggle to fulfill their duty with noble moral obligation and mission as members of the nation.
					
					 Songun Korea's sacred war of justice is sure to win as it holds the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at the head of the revolution.

articles.title: Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Assailed by Young Koreans in China
articles.content:
Key Resolve, Foal Eagle Assailed by Young Koreans in China
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The Association of Young Koreans in China on March 14 issued a statement titled "Let's thoroughly shatter war moves of provocateurs and aggressors against the north".
					 The U.S. and south Korean warmongers are holding the provocative Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK and strong public denunciation at home and abroad, the statement said.
					
					 The saber-rattling is an open military provocation to bring down the inviolable socialist country as it is a reckless war racket for invading the DPRK unprecedented in its scale, nature and program, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The north-south relations have gone beyond the uncontrollable danger line due to the war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group and their rackets for confrontation with the DPRK, and a touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula in which a nuclear war may break out anytime.
					
					 The officials of the association and all young Koreans in China will turn out as one in the sacred struggle to wipe out the provocateurs and aggressors from the earth if they dare ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Czech Republic
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Czech Republic for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Prague on March 14.
					 Miroslav Stepan, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events including seminar, film show and photo exhibition on the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Anniversary of Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten Observed
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- An event marking the 35th anniversary of the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten took place in Hanoi on March 8.
					 A report was made by the chief of the kindergarten at the event to be followed by speeches of various figures including the president of the Vietnam Union of Friendship Organizations.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the party, government and people of the DPRK built the kindergarten in the difficult period after the anti-U.S. resistance for national salvation came to an end in Vietnam and peace settled on it.
					
					 They noted that over the last 35 years the kindergarten has worked to contribute to developing the relations between the two countries.
					
					 They recalled that a joint art performance was given with splendor in Hanoi last year by teachers and children of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Kyongsang Kindergarten and the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten on the occasions of the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They stressed that the party, government and people of Vietnam and the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten would make positive efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations provided by the leaders of the two countries.
					
					 At the event a decision on awarding the Order of DPRK Friendship 1st Class to the kindergarten was introduced and a congratulatory message in the joint name of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association and the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Kyongsang Kindergarten was conveyed.
					
					 An art performance was given by teachers and children of the kindergarten.

articles.title: UN "Resolution" against DPRK Denounced by Russian Organization, Peruvian Institute
articles.content:
UN "Resolution" against DPRK Denounced by Russian Organization, Peruvian Institute
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A Russian organization and a Peruvian institute released statements on March 12 in protest against the UN Security Council's "resolution" against the DPRK.
					 The Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il's Works said:
					
					 We express full support for the just measures taken by the DPRK led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution" adopted under the pressure of the U.S. hides the aggressive scenario of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK, a beacon of independence.
					
					 The UNSC has been reduced to the root cause of evil as it justifies the U.S. ambition for aggression.
					
					 The invincible strength of the DPRK is rooted on the mental power of the army and people equipped with the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 Nothing can, therefore, bring down the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru noted:
					
					 The U.S. makes desperate efforts to provoke a nuclear war, infringing upon the internationally recognized legitimate rights and sovereignty of socialist Korea.
					
					 The progressive women of Peru vehemently condemn the aggressive moves of the U.S. imperialists against the DPRK and the UNSC's "resolution".
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle for defending the sovereignty.

articles.title: French, UK Organizations Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Maneuvers
articles.content:
French, UK Organizations Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- French and British organizations denounced the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises of the U.S. and south Korean authorities.
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association released the following press release on March 8:
					
					 The UN Security Council cooked up additional unjust "resolution on sanctions," taking issue with the nuclear test conducted by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are escalating the serious military confrontation on the Korean Peninsula as they are now under way under the simulated conditions of a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association cannot remain an onlooker to the increasing danger of a new war on the peninsula.
					
					 "Sanctions" can never work on the DPRK and they will only result in increasing the tension and military confrontation on the peninsula.
					
					 It is the only way for ensuring peace on the peninsula to conclude a peace treaty.
					
					 The association urges the permanent member states of the UNSC to play their proper roles for concluding the peace treaty on the peninsula, not slapping the unjust "sanctions" against the DPRK and clinging to provocative military threat and pressure.
					
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association noted in a statement on March 10:
					
					 The on-going joint military exercises are not defensive drills in their scale and program but war maneuvers to invade the DPRK.
					
					 All the British progressive and peace-loving forces should strongly demand the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces halt the joint military exercises at once.

articles.title: Ukrainian Organizations Express Solidarity for Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Ukrainian Organizations Express Solidarity for Korean People's Struggle
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The Dnepropetrovsk Branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Officers Union of the Soviet Union and the Sovietski Centr issued a joint statement "Let us frustrate the U.S. nuclear adventure" on March 8 in denunciation of the military provocation by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities against the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and its allies are staging provocative military drills with even nuclear weapons involved and the south Korean military is making irresponsible remarks about possible aggressive preemptive strike at the DPRK, a nuclear weapons state. These developments are pushing the world to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					 The war veterans of Ukraine experienced the burden and pain of war through the Second World War and other regional wars.
					
					 As lessons drawn by many countries showed, it is impossible to beat back the aggressors with an empty talk only. 
					
					 We, therefore,  express full support for the statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army dated March 5 and the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry dated March 7 and voice firm solidarity with the heroic Korean people in their struggle for safeguarding the country's sovereignty, national freedom and revolutionary gains.
					
					 We call upon the progressive people throughout the world to launch a solidarity campaign to hold in check the reckless military adventure of the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Russian Public Figures Support DPRK's Stand
articles.content:
Russian Public Figures Support DPRK's Stand
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Russian public figures issued statements on March 7 in protest against the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' moves against the DPRK.
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, said the Korean Peninsula has become the biggest hotspot in the world due to the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills.
					
					 The chairman went on:
					
					 Even if the U.S. ignites a war against the DPRK, it will never be able to break the single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and overpower the country's invincible military capability.
					
					 The association vehemently denounces the U.S.-south Korea joint military maneuvers disturbing peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Asia.
					
					 The Korean people will always emerge victorious as they have Marshal Kim Jong Un at the head of the party, state and army.
					
					 Ivan Slukhai, chairman of the Committee of the War Veterans of Moscow, said:
					
					 The nuclear test conducted by the DPRK to cope with the U.S. hostile action was a just measure of a sovereign state for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military drills are military provocations against the DPRK and undisguised drills for a war of aggression.
					
					 The committee extends full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for defending the country's sovereignty.
					
					 The UN Security Council should not toe the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK but take issue with the U.S. hostile policy toward it, to begin with.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Party, Organizations Denounce UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Party, Organizations Denounce UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A political party and organizations of Peru denounced the "resolution on sanctions" of the UN Security Council against the DPRK.
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute noted in their joint statement on March 10:
					
					 The U.S. and forces kowtowing to it fabricated a new UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, accusing it of the third underground nuclear test. It revealed again the ulterior design and unfairness of the U.S. and its followers accustomed to stirring up hostility to the DPRK.
					
					 Like all other countries, the DPRK has the right to develop and use space and nuclear energy for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Totally anachronistic is the U.S. logic that the nuclear and satellite should be possessed only by it.
					
					 On the same day the Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and the Peruvian Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples in their joint statement said:
					
					 The UNSC, tolerating other countries' satellite launches and nuclear tests, passed another "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK at the U.S. instigation. It is a clear example of double standards.
					
					 We extend invariable solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to defend the country's sovereignty and dignity, build a thriving nation and reunify the country.
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in its statement on the same day that no sanctions by the U.S. and forces following it will ever be able to bring the DPRK into submission.
					
					 As the DPRK has its tremendous military muscle built up thanks Songun politics and unbreakable single-minded unity, it will always demonstrate its dignity and might as a socialist fortress of Juche.

articles.title: Statement of KPA Supreme Command Spokesman Supported by Political Party of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Statement of KPA Supreme Command Spokesman Supported by Political Party of Democratic Congo
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Democratic Congo issued a statement on Mar. 10 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said:
					
					 All the members of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo who heard the statement of a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command again extended solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the heroic Korean people.
					
					 The recent measures taken by the DPRK are a manifestation of the Korean people's firm will to safeguard the sovereignty and dignity of the country and settle accounts with the imperialists.
					
					 Today the DPRK is becoming a beacon of human emancipation indicating the road to be followed by the world oppressed people.
					
					 Recognizing only one Korea, we extend full support to the Korean people's struggle for national reunification.
					
					 It is a wish of the Korean people to reunify the country divided into two by the U.S.
					
					 As the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is steering the helm of revolution, Korea will demonstrate its dignity as a reunified powerful nation.

articles.title: Japanese Organizations Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills
articles.content:
Japanese Organizations Condemn U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Japanese organizations condemned the U.S. and south Korean authorities for their moves for a war.
					 The Japan-Korea for Scientific and Educational Interchange issued a statement on March 7 branding the U.S.-south Korea joint war drills as dangerous moves for a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The Korean War which started in 1950 is not yet over. It is in the state of ceasefire.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea have staged large-scale war drills every year from a long ago.
					
					 The war drills that have repeated in a fragile state of ceasefire are very dangerous provocations which may lead to the second Korean War.
					
					 The DPRK conducted the third underground nuclear test as part of countermeasures against the U.S. moves to stifle it, taking issue with its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The world has witnessed a lot of satellite launches and nuclear tests so far, but no resolutions on sanctions were adopted by the UN over them.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies conducted nuclear tests and launched satellites recently, but UN has never found fault with them.
					
					 This is double standards and an undisguised discriminating step against the DPRK.
					
					 We vehemently condemn such behavior.
					
					 We will stage a positive action for peace in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Gunma Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity issued the following statement on March 8:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea should immediately halt their joint war drills for aggression.
					
					 For peace on the Korean Peninsula the U.S. should resume dialogue with the DPRK and replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty.

articles.title: Chinese Website Blasts U.S. Moves for New War in Korea
articles.content:
Chinese Website Blasts U.S. Moves for New War in Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Why Has DPRK Withdrawn from 1953 Armistice Agreement: Who Belligerent?" was posted on the 4th Media News, a website of China, on March 17. It blasted the U.S. imperialists' moves to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The article said:
					
					 Why has north Korea withdrawn from an armistice agreement that has kept overt hostilities on the Korean Peninsula at bay since 1953? The withdrawal serves, instead, as a signal of North Korean resolve to defend itself against growing U.S. and south Korean harassment, both military and economic.
					
					 Sanctions against North Korea are multi-form, and include a trade blockade and financial isolation. Significantly, no country in history has been menaced by such wide-ranging sanctions for so long. 
					
					 Led by Washington, the UN Security Council has authored a number of resolutions to deny North Korea rights of self-defense and other rights that other countries are free to exercise: the rights to: build ballistic missiles; launch satellites; and transfer nuclear technology to other countries. 
					
					 On top of besieging North Korea, Washington and south Korea have for decades kept up a campaign of unrelenting military harassment in the form of regular war games. 
					
					 While labeled defensive, the war games force the North Koreans onto a permanent war footing. 
					
					 There are three reasons to regard the armistice agreement as existing in form alone, and not substance.
					
					 First, the purpose of the agreement was to set the stage for a permanent peace. Despite North Korea repeatedly asking Washington to enter into a peace agreement, none has been struck. After one North Korean entreaty for peace, then U.S. secretary of state Colin Powell said. We don't do non-aggression pacts or treaties, things of that nature.
					
					 Second, the agreement was to be followed by the withdrawal of all foreign troops from the Korean Peninsula. The Chinese withdrew, as did most members of the UN forces. But the U.S. forces, which have remained in south Korea for the last 60 years, have become a permanent fixture on the peninsula. Incredibly, south Korean forces remain under the U.S. command.
					
					 Third, the agreement prohibits the introduction into Korea of reinforcing combat aircraft, armored vehicles, weapons and ammunition. The U.S. violated the agreement by introducing nuclear weapons into south Korea in 1958.
					
					 Recalling that the Korean War was imposed by the U.S. and its lackeys on the north, the article continued: 
					
					 Had the United States not intervened the country would have been re-united.
					
					 The article noted that the U.S. goal was to ruin North Korea's economy oriented to channeling all its efforts to people's welfare and development, destabilize its society and bring it to its knees.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de tiro de drones y cohetes antiaereos automoviles
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de tiro de drones y cohetes antiaereos automoviles
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio el dia 20 los ejercicios de golpe de drones de superprecision a los blancos y el tiro de cohetes antiaereos automoviles contra misiles cruceros de "enemigo" que asaltan a baja altura.
					En el mismo lugar le acogieron los comandantes de las unidades de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas y de artilleria del EPC.
					
					Tras recibir en el puesto de vigilancia el parte del plan de entrenamiento, el Comandante Supremo dio la orden de iniciarlo.
					
					Los drones de superprecision despegados hicieron el vuelo de largo alcance planificado y aniquilaron correctamente los blancos  del "puesto de enemigo".
					
					Viendo atentamente con binoculos el proceso  de golpe de los drones el Mariscal dijo que es rapida la velocidad de los drones y muy alta la capacidad de captar los blancos.
					
					Destaco que hoy, reviso la capacidad del golpe de los drones a los objetos calculando su linea de aviacion y el tiempo de su vuelo hasta el cielo del Sur de Corea donde estan estacionados los blancos enemigos y se mostro muy satisfecho de que los drones pueden golpear a superprecision cualesquier objetos enemigos.
					
					Acto seguido, se inicio el tiro de cohetes antiaereos automoviles a misiles cruceros del "enemigo" que asaltan a ras de tierra.
					
					Los cohetes despedazaron de un tiro a los presuntos misiles cruceros "Tomahawk" que aparecieron sobre el cielo del campo de ejercicios.
					
					El Comandante Supremo anadio con satisfaccion que evalua altamente la revision de la funcion de cohetes antiaereos automoviles.
					
					Ordeno a los comandantes hacer todos los preparativos para golpear a superprecision en cualquier momento a cualesquier blancos elevando la funcion de drones y cohetes que mostraron hoy su poderio.
					
					Si el entrenamiento se extiende al combate real, los enemigos probaran el golpe de venganza del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu  y no veran mas el cielo, recalco.
					
					En caso de que los enemigos se atrevan a atacarnos olvidandose del potente poderio de nuestro ejercito popular, dara la orden de  reducir a cenizas tanto los objetos  militares y los organos de gobernacion de los reaccionarios titeres en la zona de operacion del Sur de Corea como las instalaciones relacionadas de los paises satelites que se sumen a las maniobras de guerra de agresion del imperialismo norteamericano y  las bases militares de las tropas agresoras yanquis en la region de operacion del Pacifico, enseno.
					
					Dijo tajantemente que ya paso el tiempo de palabras, y agrego si se inicia el combate ahora mismo aniquilen sin piedad a todos los enemigos para que no quede ni un tipejo que firme el acta de capitulacion.
					
					El Comandante Supremo presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en registrar en los medios teledirigidos de ataque todas las coordenadas de los objetos enemigos en la zona de operacion del Sur de Corea para que puedan golpearlos punto por punto en cualquier momento con los medios teledirigidos de golpe de superprecision a nuestro estilo y perfeccionar todos los preparativos de combate del ejercito popular de acuerdo con la demanda de la situacion creada.
					
					Dio enfasis otra vez en que todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC se mantengan en el estado de alta alerta y esperen la orden del Comandante Supremo de iniciar el gran avance por la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Y tomo fotos de recuerdo con los oficiales y soldados que realizaron con exito el entrenamiento.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Pyong Chol, Pak Jong Chon y Son Chong Nam.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a su homologo de Tunez
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a su homologo de Tunez
						
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Tunez, Al Moncef Al Marzouki, con motivo del dia nacional de este pais.
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Tunez y desea de todo corazon al amistoso pueblo de Tunez mayor progreso y prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Namibia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Namibia
						
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Namibia, Hifikepunye Pohamba, con motivo del 23o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					En la misiva, el remitente desea al destinatario y al pueblo namibio mayores exitos en promover la unidad nacional y lograr el desarrollo socioeconomico del pais.
					
					Expresa la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Namibia.

articles.title: Exhibicion Nacional de Articulos de Consumo Popular
articles.content:
Exhibicion Nacional de Articulos de Consumo Popular
						
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tiene lugar en la capitalina Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones la Exhibicion Nacional de Articulos de Consumo Popular en medio de gran atencion de los funcionarios y productores de la rama de la industria ligera y otros trabajadores.
					Entrevistado con la ACNC, el director del Ministerio de la Industria Ligera Kim Pyong O (52 anos de edad) dijo que la exhibicion sirve de un importante motivo para generalizar los exitos y las experiencias de las unidades ejemplares de la rama.
					
					Sobresalen los panes, confites, carnes procesados de las Fabricas de Alimentos de Sonhung y de Kumsong.
					
					Las botas de futbol, baloncesto, ping-pong y otras disciplinas deportivas fabricadas en la Fabrica de Calzados de Ryuwon, ganan reputacion entre los deportistas.
					
					Entre los mostradores se ven los cosmeticos funcionales y perfumes de buena calidad, producidos en la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Sinuiju y la Fabrica de Perfumeria de Pyongyang, asi como coches cuna y bicicletas de la Compania Mixta de Bicicleta Phyongjin.
					
					Recorriendo el lugar, los funcionarios y los productores aprenden las experiencias y buscan los metodos para mejorar la calidad de los articulos de consumo e incrementar las variedades.

articles.title: Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, aparato a favor de despotismo de imperialistas (2)
articles.content:
Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, aparato a favor de despotismo de imperialistas (2)
Pyongyang, 20 de marzo (ACNC) -- La guerra afgana, desatada en el primer ano del siglo XXI, fue un terror de Estado sin precedente, que Estados Unidos desencadeno abusando del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					Inmediatamente despues del incidente del 11 de septiembre de 2001, EE.UU. preparo una nueva guerra en ambito mundial llamada "guerra antiterrorista" infundiendo en la sociedad internacional el "temor por el terrorismo". 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, para justificarla en la arena internacional se desespero para aprobar la resolucion antiterrorista en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					En la Asamblea General de la ONU, el presidente estadounidense de aquel entonces Bush dijo que todos los paises tienen el deber de incorporarse a la "guerra antiterrorista", en virtud de la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad, y que seran culpables los paises que apoyan a los terroristas o les ofrecen refugios. 
					
					Esto fue una declaracion de guerra de atacar en cualquier momento a cualquier pais. 
					
					En fin de cuentas, Afganistan fue la primera victima de la "guerra antiterrorista". 
					
					Hoy dia, todo el mundo conoce que la "guerra antiterrorista", desatada freneticamente por la administracion norteamericana Bush, fue la guerra de agresion segun la nueva estrategia hegemonica de los neoconservadores, que sonaban con el "establecimiento del mundo unipolarizado" bajo el mando de EE.UU., debido a lo cual se vieron amenazadas la paz y la seguridad del mundo. 
					
					Es una tragedia el que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, responsable de la paz y seguridad internacionales, actuo conforme al guion de los imperialistas norteamericanos.
					
					Lo mismo caso se repitio en Iraq.
					
					Despues de la guerra persica, EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales recurrieron tenazmente a la campana intrigante para derrocar el gobierno iraqui. Al fijarlo como blanco de ataque despues de Afganistan, difundio el rumor de "amenaza de armas de exterminio masivo" de dicho pais y sometieron ese asunto a la consideracion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					Como resultado de la presion de EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales y del regateo politico entre las potencias, fue aprobada en noviembre de 2002 la resolucion no. 1441 del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU sobre la inspeccion de armas de Iraq.
					
					El documento dio a Iraq la ultima oportunidad de cumplir el deber de desarme, que demandan las resoluciones concernientes de dicho Consejo y declaro que en el caso contrario, ese pais persico se encontrara en el dilema sin salida.
					
					Esto fue para EE.UU. el "permiso de guerra" contra Iraq, estimo la opinion publica mundial.
					
					El imperio obligo a Iraq el desarme total y confirmo que ese pais no tenia las armas de exterminio masivo. 
					
					En febrero de 2003, presento en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU los datos falsificados sobre la posesion de las armas de exterminio masivo en Iraq y la vinculacion del gobierno iraqui con las organizaciones terroristas. De esta manera, justifico la invasion armada contra Iraq.
					
					Al cabo de tales complots, comenzo el ataque armado contra Iraq en marzo de ese ano. 
					
					El mundo expreso gran indignacion por el ataque contra el Estado soberano cometido por EE.UU. abusando del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
